Your very own generated Smash Mouth song:
IOException, you might not have internet connection
Your generated lyrics will go here!
Please give your song a name
Please give at least one album a weight
Your lyrics are ready for you in the "Lyrics" tab
Bruh you have to generate a song first

I made this app to strengthen my Android knowledge in pursuit of an internship and/or job. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to me at perozzi.n@gmail.com. Thanks for your time, and I hope you enjoy the app!
I don\'t own the rights to any Smash Mouth music please do not sue me I am not making any money from this app I promise
Each time the Generate Lyrics button is pressed, world-famous rock band Smash Mouth is notified and writes a completely personalized song in seconds based on which albums of theirs you prefer.
Feel free to fine tune the lyrics (and title) to your liking!
Download someBODY, the leading app for generating lyrics from worldwide hit sensation Smash Mouth!
Your saved lyrics will show up here!
